name: sleep
shortDescription: delay for a specified amount of time
longDescription: Pause  for NUMBER seconds.  SUFFIX may be 's' for seconds (the default), 'm' for minutes, 'h' for hours or 'd' for days.  Unlike most implementations that require NUMBER be an integer, here  NUMBER  may  be  an  arbitrary floating  point  number.   Given  two  or more arguments, pause for the amount of time specified by the sum of their values.
